profile.name: Eric Villasenor
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at DigitalOcean, passionate about building scalable and efficient software solutions
profile.summary: Highly motivated and detail-oriented software engineer with a strong passion for delivering high-quality products. Proficient in a range of programming languages and technologies.
profile.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend DigitalOcean as a potential employer for Eric Villasenor

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at DigitalOcean
description: Designed and developed scalable software solutions for high-traffic applications
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize project requirements
Improved code quality and efficiency through the implementation of automated testing and deployment scripts

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients across various industries
Managed multiple projects simultaneously, meeting tight deadlines and delivering high-quality results

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of open-source projects
